metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010057 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: nfdump 1.6.16 and earlier is affected by: Buffer Overflow. The impact is: The impact could range from a denial of service to local code execution. The component is: nfx.c:546, nffile_inline.c:83, minilzo.c (redistributed). The attack vector is: nfdump must read and process a specially crafted file. The fixed version is: after commit 9f0fe9563366f62a71d34c92229da3432ec5cf0e.

criterions.comment: nfdump package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.17-1').
